sentences.en: Is your cooker gas or electric?
sentences.cn: 你的炊具用煤气还是用电?

sentences.en: Mum has just won a microwave cooker.
sentences.cn: 妈妈刚刚赢得一台微波炉.

sentences.en: She plugged in and began to cook with the cooker.
sentences.cn: 她接通电源,然后开始用电炉做饭.

sentences.en: She pre - set the cooker to come on at 6.30.
sentences.cn: 她把炊具预先调好在6点30分钟操作.

sentences.en: The cooker is giving off a funny smell.
The cooker is not yet wired in to the main supply.
The cooker isn't working because of an electrical fault.
sentences.cn: 这个炊具不能用了,因为出了电气方面的故障.

sentences.en: The cooker, heaters and other electrical installations are all in perfect working order.
sentences.cn: 厨房 、 加热器以及其他电器设备都处于完好的工作状态.

sentences.en: The slow cooker is very useful for people who go out all day.
sentences.cn: 慢炖锅对于整天都不在家的人来说很有用。

sentences.en: There is an electric cooker in the kitchen.
This giant pressure cooker may lie undisturbed.
sentences.cn: 这只巨大的高压锅可以安然无事地呆在那里.

sentences.en: We heated the soup on the cooker.
What colour is the electric cooker?

words.tran_cn: 炊具；烹饪用水果；窜改者

phrases.tran_cn: n. 高压锅；加压蒸汽速煮器
